title: Penguin Graded Readers. Dracula. Level 3
description:
Penguin Graded Readers: Dracula (Level 3)

There is a scan of the book in PDF format with the activities. There are also two folders with the audio files in mp3 format.



Classic / British English Count Dracula is a vampire. He drinks people's blood. He lives in a lonely castle in the mountains of Transylvania. But then he comes to England and strange things start happening. People change. People become ill. Professor Van Helsing knows about vampires, but can he stop Count Dracula?




You can find the teachers' notes and ideas for more activities here:
 
http://www.penguinreaders.com/pdf/downloads/pr/teachers-notes/9781405878982.pdf



Please share the torrent and seed until your share ratio is at least 1.1
